text: Ashes of Paradise () is a 1997 Argentine crime thriller movie directed by Marcelo Piñeyro and starring Héctor Alterio, Cecilia Roth, Leticia Brédice, Leonardo Sbaraglia, Jorge Marrale. ==Other websites== * * Category:1997 crime thriller movies Category:Argentine crime movies Category:Argentine thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Marcelo Piñeyro
title: Ashes of Paradise
